title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 700.10 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 700.10 - Fees

State Regulations

Except when a different fee is otherwise prescribed by
law: (a) There shall be no fee charged
for the following: (1)
inspection of
records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant
to this Part. (b) A fee
for copies of records may be charged provided that: (1)
the fee for photocopies of records shall
not exceed 25 cents per page for photo copies not exceeding 9 by 14 inches; and
(2)
the fee for reproducing any
other records shall not exceed the actual reproduction cost, which shall be the
average unit cost for copying a record, excluding fixed costs such as operator
salaries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
700.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
